channel.title: Journey - Pieter van Boven

I've made a new song!
I hope you enjoy it!

item.title: Journey - Pieter van Boven
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
Gave it a listen, real nice. I like slower drums on my tracks too. Personally found it repetitive and therefore it felt long. I’d work on moving through your tracks quicker, keeping it to 3:00 to 3:30 minutes if you can. It’ll force you to hit your rises and climax a bit faster.

Read full topic
